recommendations: Gaurav Jain “Asma is one of the most talented persons that I have come across. Her enthusiasm, building team engagement connects is commendable. If anyone looking to plan any team engagement event then Asma is the go to person. She possess strong analytical and learning acumen. She keeps her calm in tough situations and would not fear to voice out her opinion. She always comes up with innovative and fruitful ideas in brainstorming sessions. I am sure wherever she goes, she would excel in all her future endeavors and would achieve great heights.”
